subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nik Antropov dove on his belly to score the go-ahead goal in a vital victory over the Montreal Canadiens that pulled the eighth-place Rangers within a point of seventh-place Montreal.
snippet: Nik Antropov dove on his belly to score the go-ahead goal in a vital victory over the Montreal Canadiens that pulled the eighth-place Rangers within a point of seventh-place Montreal.
